title: WTS/WTT T206 Maddox PSA 5, Leifield PSA 4 PIRATES, $PENDING
author: mintacular

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT T206 Maddox PSA 5, Leifield PSA 4 PIRATES, $PENDING
posts.post_content:
Might trade these 2 for any fresh NM or better 57, 71 BB but would accept $PENDING dlvd. Good eye appeal with & centering. Backs are fine (maybe O/C) and can send scans...
